column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Another discovery I found that night
column2: yeah I kinda felt like the Ponce de Leon of tapas
column3: was that all these small dishes left me feeling right for some dessert.  The thought of ordering a number of small dishes for dessert left me feeling very empowered and indulgent and not at all indecisive.  A few minutes later I had the Gala Apple Empanada
column4: Marcona Almond Caramel Bar and Chocolate Truffle Cake sitting in front of me.  All amazing choices
column5: but the Marcona Almond Caramel Bar left me wanting more...of it.  I shed a brief tear of sadness when the last bite was finished.  I'm actually finding it difficult to finish this review and not go there for that dish.
